main event: A series of bright lights were observed maneuvering in the sky over Alexandria, Louisiana on 2 May 1962.
interesting points: The witness observed as many as 3 bright lights moving at high speeds and making abrupt changes in direction., When the lights were hovering, they flashed red and green., The large light observed on 1 May 1962 was similar to aircraft running lights and moved rapidly in a straight line., The observer described one of the objects as having a white center surrounded by reddish-orange., The cylindrical object observed on 6 May 1962 hovered above an airport light and moved laterally for about 15 seconds.
sighted object: bright lights and a cylindrical object
witness description: Civilian pilot and radar control operator, and one witness for the 1 May observation
